## Releases

* The Release schedule for the <font class="bold red">73X</font> and
  <font class="bold blue">74X</font> cycles has been changed, as
  announced by O&C management over hypernews ([link to the
  message](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/swDevelopment/3107.html))

* You can find the current schedule for the <font class="bold
  blue">74X</font> cycle at the usual [TWiki
  page](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/CMSSW_7_4_0)

### The summary for planned deadlines for 73X is:

* CMSSW_7_3_0_pre1: 13 October 2014
* CMSSW_7_3_0_pre2: 27 October 2014 (Last open for substantial local reco/digitization features)
* CMSSW_7_3_0_pre3: 18 November 2014 (<font class="bold red">LAST OPEN RELEASE</font>)
* CMSSW_7_3_0: 8 December 2014

---
## Releases

### The summary for planned deadlines for 74X is:

* CMSSW_7_4_0_pre1: 25 November 2014
* CMSSW_7_4_0_pre2: 9 December 2014 (<font class="bold red">Last open for substantial tracking changes</font>)
* CMSSW_7_4_0_pre3: 6 January 2015
* CMSSW_7_4_0_pre4: 26 January 2015
* CMSSW_7_4_0_pre5: 3 February 2015 (Last open prerelease)
* CMSSW_7_4_0_pre6: 17 February 2015 (bug fix release as needed)
* CMSSW_7_4_0: 11 March 2014

## Releases

### CMSSW_7_3_0_pre2_DEVEL
#### [Changes since CMSSW_7_3_0_pre1](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_7_3_0_pre1...CMSSW_7_3_0_pre2)

1. [6285](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/6285)  from @bartokm: Pixel Dynamic Inefficiency factors for RUN2 `simulation` 

1. [5951](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5951)  from @fojensen: V0branch - modifications to V0Fitter (V0Producer) for PU `reconstruction` 

1. [6252](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/6252)  from @StoyanStoynev: Update types of event/run/lumi in Tracking/Vertexing `reconstruction` 

1. [6029](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/6029)  from @mtosi: fix new CCC parameter naming introduced in 5853 `reconstruction` 

1. [5853](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5853)  from @VinInn: Cluster Charge Cut rework `reconstruction` 

1. [5807](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5807)  from @JuantAldea: Tracking iteration names changed to match iteration Python labels `alca`  `analysis`  `dqm`  `fastsim`  `reconstruction` 

1. [5743](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5743)  from @VinInn: Prepare for cluster splitting step0 `alca`  `daq`  `dqm`  `reconstruction`
